Plot: John and Molly, a divorced middle aged man and a single mother meet at a friends party and start up a small relationship, all John has to do now is meet Molly's son... Cyrus
Title: Cyrus
Actors: John C. Reilly, Jonah Hill, Marisa Tomei, Catherine Keener
tomatoConsensus: While it may strike some viewers as slight, Cyrus is a successful hybrid of mainstream production values and the mumblecore ideals of directors Jay and Mark Duplass.
